import {React, useState } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardSubtitle, Button, CardText } from 'reactstrap' import Popup from '../shared/Popup' import Slider from '../components/slider/Slider' import productLists from '../assets/data/products-list' import "../styles/product.css" const Product = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedProduct, setSelectedProduct] = useState(null); const toggleModal = (productId) => { setSelectedProduct(productId); setIsOpen(!isOpen); } window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }) return <> {/* ====================== */}

Tất cả các sản phẩm
{productLists.map((product) => ( {product.type == 'tea' ? 'Trà nguyên chất' : 'Trà sữa'}

{product.title}

 {product.desc}
{product.price.toLocaleString('vi-VN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' })}
))} toggleModal(null)} productId={selectedProduct} /> } export default Product
